item.title: Hey Sister is out now!
item.description: Our new single Hey Sister is out now. You can listen to it right here. For the full press kit, click here.

item.title: Grunnsonic Livestream
item.description: On Friday January 15th we'll be playing Grunnsonic. The event can be followed on a livestream that will air here on Friday January 15th at 9pm (CET). The line-up has been put together by POPgroningen, the pop-organization of the Province of Groningen, in collaboration with ESNS. Local acts present themselves to the public and music professionals during ESNS in an entirely digital program. The program consists of showcases and interviews with the selected acts.

item.title: Nominee Best Talent ESNS Popgala Noord
item.description: We're proud to announce we've been nominated for Best Talent at the Popgala Noord (part of the Eurosonic Noorderslag festival). Popgala Noord is the award show for pop culture of the Northern part of the Netherlands. Especially the three provinces Drenthe, Friesland and Groningen. Popgala Noord 2021 will be a digital event and it will take place on january 12 at 17:00. The show will be recorded in Vera and will be broadcasted on Podium TV and the digital channels of the Leeuwarder Courant and the Dagblad van het Noorden.

item.title: Selected for Hit The North
item.description: We're happy to announce we've been selected for the Hit the North talent development program. Hit the North is a unique collaboration between festivals, media, venues and educative institutions from the north of the Netherlands. Hit the North is established to stimulate professional talent development in Groningen, Friesland and Drenthe. Northern pop culture is unique, but often artists experience many difficulties that hold them back from really breaking through.

item.title: Winner of the 2020 POPgroningen Talent Award
item.description: On Saturday December 12th 2020 we won the POPgroningen Talent Award. In their feedback the jury said that we were able to “convince with a solid show. The tight teamwork and comfortable stage presence made the scouts believe that the band are ready to enter the Dutch music scene”. Read more here (Dutch)

item.description: Jonathan RhodesHey Sister Audio preview (or download high quality .wav) Jonathan Rhodes 路 Hey Sister Release type: single Track title: Hey Sister Artist name: Jonathan Rhodes Release date: January 8th 2021 ISRC: QZNWW2029785 UPC: 195915000419 Photos Click to download in high-res Promotional video This video can be used in Facebook and Instagram stories.

item.title: Jonathan Rhodes Release EPK
item.description: Jonathan RhodesTime & Money Release type: single Track title: Time & Money Artist name: Jonathan Rhodes Release date: August 20th 2020 ISRC: QZHNB2091399 UPC: 195398371655 -- Audio (download .wav) Jonathan Rhodes 路 Time & Money -- Video (download 4K .mp4) Press release Dutch roots formation Jonathan Rhodes Band uncovers American history with new single Time & Money Groningen, NL - August 20th 2020 Five months after the release of their debut single Blind, Dutch roots formation Jonathan Rhodes Band release their second single Time & Money.

item.title: Jonathan Rhodes Release EPK
item.description: Jonathan RhodesSeven Release type: single Track title: Seven Artist name: Jonathan Rhodes Release date: November 2nd 2020 ISRC: QZNWQ2043977 UPC: 195756742677 -- Audio (download .wav) Press release Jonathan Rhodes releases acoustic single 'Seven' on life and death Groningen, The Netherlands - November 4th 2020 In preparation for the Groningen (NL) regional Talent Award, americana songwriter Jonathan Rhodes today releases a surprise single.
